Please send any MCU-related questions here, for questions about Star Wars please send them here.

tags: someone should give the ''painting poc as aliens'' thing a name 2bh
summary: Regarding Captain Marvel: Official photos were released today, and I’m kinda pissed. I know Gemma Chan is playing a Kree and the...
question: Regarding Captain Marvel: Official photos were released today, and I’m kinda pissed. I know Gemma Chan is playing a Kree and the Kree are blue, so I should expect her to be blue, but Djimon Hounsou’s character is also Kree, and his skin is unchanged. Why the difference?
answer:
In-universe, the answer is that kree can be “blue” or “pink.” The original ones were blue, but later some of them started to look like white people: 

The original Kree had blue-colored skin, but a second racial group with pink skin resembling that of human Caucasians emerged over the millennia. The blue-skinned “purebred” Kree have become a small, but powerful, minority. Pink Kree are much more durable than their blue racial brethren.

I don’t know what character each of them are playing, but the problem in this case goes back to the comics, because apparently there were none non-white (not even light-skinned) “pink“ kree. 

This is one of those moments where it would’ve been Nice if Marvel had gotten away from canon (like…they’ve done…so many times…) and instead added more diversity to their own stories. ~ mod ara

blog.name: supermoviemaniac

blog.description: All things Marvel - from movies to TV, to comics to games! I'm the biggest nerd there is... so watch me talk, share and speculate about the wonder that is, the world of superheroes!

summary:
FIRST LOOK AT CAPTAIN MARVEL!
Thanks, Entertainment Weekly for our first proper look at the new Captain in town! I must say, the...
body:
FIRST LOOK AT CAPTAIN MARVEL!

Thanks, Entertainment Weekly for our first proper look at the new Captain in town! I must say, the Skrulls look f*****g brilliant! I’m kinda glad they took the make up route over motion capture - it’s a nice break from the heavy use of mo-cap.

Did you guys notice Ronan, and Korath as part of the Kree squadron? Exciting stuff! It’ll be weird seeing things from the Kree’s perspective, but it’ll be interesting to see a pre-zealous Ronan leading Carol into battle.

Overall, I’m super hyped! The costume looks great! What do you guys think?

reblog.comment:

summary: Earlier this summer, I had a dream about Captain Marvel’s origins (because my subconscious likes to re-process that stuff in my...
body:
Earlier this summer, I had a dream about Captain Marvel’s origins (because my subconscious likes to re-process that stuff in my sleep). In the dream, I followed Carol Danvers around the air force base where she was stationed. She walked through a lot of large warehouse/gymnasium-type buildings, probably airplane hangars, all connected with long walkways. She passed a front desk and a gift shop on the way. 

Last week when I went to the Hill Aerospace museum, well–the indoor exhibits are all the same kinds of buildings. I walked into the main entryway and I felt like I was back in that dream. And of course the place has a gift shop. But there are two big hangars for showcasing old airplanes, both connected by two long hallways. I got serious chills.

For the record I have been to that museum before, but that was when I was a little kid.
